ai-ja159:1.2_0: and the color of gold coins that has fallen to this land.
ai-ja159:1.3_0: I shall worship you, digest the earth,
ai-ja159:1.4_0: you must live in the forest for a day.
ai-ja159:2.1_0: Those brahmins who know the principles of all things,
ai-ja159:2.2_0: and they don’t urge me to go on.
ai-ja159:3.1_0: and the king, the only one-eyed,
ai-ja159:3.2_0: and the color of gold coins that has fallen to this land.
ai-ja159:3.3_0: I shall worship you, digest the earth,
ai-ja159:3.4_0: you must stay for the night.
ai-ja159:4.1_0: Those brahmins who know the principles of all things,
ai-ja159:4.2_0: and they don’t urge me to go on.
ai-ja159:4.6_0: I can’t see the dart of misery.”
